summary: My supervisor was one of those guys who initially didn't see Captain Marvel in the theater because of Brie Larson, but I think...
body:
My supervisor was one of those guys who initially didn’t see Captain Marvel in the theater because of Brie Larson, but I think between my constant fangirling of it and finding out there was a cat in it, he decided to watch it when it came out on blu-ray.

I asked if he liked it, and he was like, “It was actually pretty good.” Additionally, he said the complaint he heard most, that it was slow in the middle, wasn’t true for him; he was engaged through the whole movie. His only complaint was how Nick Fury lost his eye.

It kind of gives me hope that maybe some of the other dudes that didn’t watch Captain Marvel at first will like it once they give it a chance.

I asked if he liked it, and he was like, “It was actually pretty good.” Additionally, he said the complaint he heard most, that it was slow in the middle, wasn’t true for him; he was engaged through the whole movie. His only complaint was how Nick Fury lost his eye.

It kind of gives me hope that maybe some of the other dudes that didn’t watch Captain Marvel at first will like it once they give it a chance.

My supervisor was one of those guys who initially didn’t see Captain Marvel in the theater because of Brie Larson, but I think between my constant fangirling of it and finding out there was a cat in it, he decided to watch it when it came out on blu-ray.

I asked if he liked it, and he was like, “It was actually pretty good.” Additionally, he said the complaint he heard most, that it was slow in the middle, wasn’t true for him; he was engaged through the whole movie. His only complaint was how Nick Fury lost his eye.

It kind of gives me hope that maybe some of the other dudes that didn’t watch Captain Marvel at first will like it once they give it a chance.

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

summary: Captain Marvel has been flying into home entertainment systems around the globe and we just can’t contain our excitement! We...
body:
Captain Marvel has been flying into home entertainment systems around the globe and we just can’t contain our excitement! We definitely loved the film when it hit theaters and you can even check out of our review of it from a home setting. Of course, one of the best parts of bringing a movie home is the bonus features! Check out these special bonus clips featuring the Kree below!

Of course, that’s not all! Enjoy some special concept art featuring each individual Kree and the group as a whole! Check out the whole gallery of each epic piece of art below.

Be sure to grab Captain Marvel on 4K Ultra HD™, Blu-ray™, DVD and Digital HD now! We can’t wait to hear what you think about all the special bonus features! Here are more of the features you can see from the comfort of your own home:

  • See into the transformative journey of Brie Larson and her influence around the globe
  • Nick Fury’s influence on the MCU
  • See the perfect pairing of directors Anna Boden & Ryan Fleck
  • The ongoing conflict between Skrulls and Kree
  • Purr-fect talent behind Goose on screen

Will you be grabbing Captain Marvel? Connect with us on Twitter and Facebook to let us know!

Get Ready to Bring “Captain Marvel” to Your Home Entertainment System with Special Bonus Features Featuring the Kree Captain Marvel has been flying into home entertainment systems around the globe and we just can’t contain our excitement!

Like cat calling is appropriate but a woman standing up for herself is not

summary: Because the Misogynist Russo Brothers made her Ugly and she look alike Donald Trump in Avengers: Endgame (A.K.A. Avengers:...
body:
Because the Misogynist Russo Brothers made her Ugly and she look alike Donald Trump in Avengers: Endgame (A.K.A. Avengers: MENgame). Her Ugly Undercut Hairstyle is the Reason why I DON’T want a Sequel.

Captain Marvel looks Cute and Beautiful in her own Solo Movie.

I wish Carol Danvers is a DC Heroine instead of a Marvel Heroine.

P.S. Pageboy/Wings/Beatles Hairstyle is Better than Undercut Hairstyle.

And Marvel is Anti-Wonder Woman.
